text_with_dna: The researchers were examining the specific genetic markers. They found that the following sequence was particularly interesting for their study on disease resistance: TTCCTTCGATGAAGTGATTGTTGACAGTAATGGCAAGAAACTGGACATGCGCTTTGGCGGTAATTTAACGGCAGCAGAAGAGAAGAAAACGGGTTGCCTGGTGTGTCTGGATAGCTGCCCGGTCGGCATCGTCA. This fragment, they hypothesized, played a crucial role.
